head.title: There Are Some Answers To Family Court Quagmire

hedline.hl1: There Are Some Answers To Family Court Quagmire

abstract.p: Legal Information for Families Today board member Leslie A Abbey letter on September 10 article holds it is encouraging that Family Court has become more user-friendly (S)

block.p: There are encouraging signs. In 1996, two young Family Court attorneys decided to make Family Court more user-friendly by creating Legal Information for Families Today (LIFT). This nonprofit organization is dedicated to assisting Family Court litigants and raising awareness of Family Court issues.

There are encouraging signs. In 1996, two young Family Court attorneys decided to make Family Court more user-friendly by creating Legal Information for Families Today (LIFT). This nonprofit organization is dedicated to assisting Family Court litigants and raising awareness of Family Court issues.
LIFT operates information tables in the Bronx, Manhattan and Brooklyn Family Courts. Staff answer questions and provide written information on all issues of concern to Family Court litigants.
The writer is a board member of Legal Information for Families Today.
